author: Michelle L. Rivera

review: I've tried many different devices for streaming my local media. I thought it was a lost cause because they were all jittery or took far too long to load. Even the Apple TV was a sub par experience. My mind was instantly changed by this device which was surprising due to its price point. I was considering building a small home theater PC for a few hundred dollars, but with this device I was able to pair it with my old note 3 to stream media right to my tv. It's definitely worth every penny.
author: Ryan eman
